ing: 1 (16 ounce) jar creamy salad dressing (such as Miracle WhipÂ®)
1/4 cup thousand island salad dressing (such as KraftÂ®)
des: "This is just like the famous sandwich spread in a jar."
ins: Place the pickle relish into a colander set in the sink, and allow it to drain for about 30 minutes. Mix the drained relish, creamy salad dressing, and thousand island dressing in a large bowl until thoroughly combined. Place into a 1-quart jar, and refrigerate overnight to blend flavors.
